reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.stage.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content authoring' menu link.
Click the 'Content lock' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content lock dialog'.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Pub Post' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Post' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Post' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'People' menu link.
Click the 'Add user' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'People dialog'.
Enter '7ae0e18ab9714d9@a8413819ce63455.com' in the 'Username' text box.
Enter '7ae0e18ab9714d9@a8413819ce63455.com' in the 'E-mail address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Confirm password' text box.
Check the 'editor' checkbox.
Enter 'ff45ee01e23e43c' in the 'First Name' text box.
Enter '99a1d9938b244d0' in the 'Last Name' text box.
Click the 'Create new account' button.
Verify success message of 'A welcome message with further instructions has been e-mailed to the new user 7ae0e18ab9714d9@a8413819ce63455.com.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'People' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Permissions' menu link.
Click the 'Roles' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'People dialog'.
Click the 'Edit Permissions' link for the 'Editor' role.
Switch to the active frame titled 'People dialog'.
Click the 'Save Permissions' button.
Verify success message of 'The changes have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Click the 'Logout' button.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '5745042809c044d' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 5745042809c044d has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Click the 'Edit' link for content item titled '5745042809c044d.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit Post 5745042809c044d dialog'.
Verify success message of 'This document is now locked against simultaneous editing. It will unlock when you navigate elsewhere.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify success message of 'Your lock will be considered stale and up for grabs in 30 min.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
